definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: back—(so also Di Hoffm SS; LXX Thes De AV RV body = [[גְּוִיׇּה]], cf. Ba:ZMG 1887, 605) Job 20:25 [[וַיֵּחֵיא מִגֵּוׇה]] it comes out from the back (of arrow which has struck a fugitive, and is then extracted; Hoffm rds. [[מִגֵּוֹה]]).—I. [[גֵּוׇה]] sub [[גאה]].
